verification_steps: Click verification link sent to registered email
Answer 2 security questions
Receive temporary password via SMS (ending in **5678)
additional_notes: Account will unlock after successful reset

verification_steps: Verify identity using employee badge number
Confirm department and manager name
Reset password via secure portal
Login with current expired password
Set new password meeting complexity requirements
Confirm new password and save

alternative_method.contact: Use password reset portal at portal.company.com

additional_notes: Password must meet complexity requirements: 12+ characters, uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters

verification_steps: Account has been temporarily suspended for security
Call IT Security at ext. 5000 immediately
Verify identity with manager and security team
Complete mandatory security training before reactivation

alternative_method.contact: IT Security Team - ext. 5000 or security@company.com

additional_notes: Security incident detected. Account requires full security review and clearance.

verification_steps: Open welcome email from IT department
Click activation link (valid for 48 hours)
Set up security questions (minimum 3)
Create strong password and enable MFA

alternative_method.contact: Contact your manager or IT onboarding team at ext. 4600

additional_notes: New employee setup. MFA enrollment required for account activation.

verification_steps: Verify identity using backup email verification
Confirm last 4 digits of registered phone number
Reset MFA device configuration
Reconfigure authenticator app or register new device

alternative_method.contact: IT Support at ext. 4500 with backup codes or recovery key

additional_notes: MFA device no longer accessible. Keep backup codes in safe location after reset.

verification_steps: Reset VPN credentials through self-service portal
Download new VPN configuration file
Install updated VPN profile on device
Test VPN connection with new credentials

alternative_method.contact: Network team at ext. 4700 for VPN assistance

additional_notes: VPN password separate from main account. Remote workers priority support available.

verification_steps: Manager must approve temporary access extension
Submit contractor access form via ServiceNow
Receive temporary credentials via secure email
Access valid for specified contract period only

alternative_method.contact: Contractor Support at ext. 4800 or contractors@company.com

additional_notes: Contractor accounts require manager approval. Access automatically expires at contract end date.
